meanings.definition: A unit of area equal to one square meter.
meanings.sent1: The garden measured one centiare in size.
meanings.sent2: The real estate agent advertised a plot of land as five centiares.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally planted a centiare of flowers in the wrong spot!
meanings.sent4: Her smile covered every centiare of the photograph.
meanings.sent5: The artist meticulously painted each centiare of the canvas.

meanings.definition: A centesimal division of an are.
meanings.sent1: The land was divided into centiares for easier measurement.
meanings.sent2: The farmer owned several centiares of fertile soil.
meanings.sent3: I found a centiare of chocolate hidden in my bag!
meanings.sent4: His love for her filled every centiare of his heart.
meanings.sent5: The map displayed each centiare of the city in detail.
